name: Vexation: Hand Crafted Hell (Demo)
description:
Vexation is the only rage game that's fun to play!

Every level is a different genre and art style all packaged within their own little pockets of terrible game design. But while fun, it's still a rage game...

The entire idea of the game was to remove the issue of players who don't want to have to repeat the same sections of a game over and over again due to its difficulty. That's why the order of levels you play is different every time you die and there's plenty of content to be seen outside of the main ten levels.

However, all that considered, it is still a rage game. I've tried my best to create a fun environment; but there's a big difference between playing a game and trying to beat it.

The challenges that you will face on your journey.

Ten levels, each with a collection of the worst tropes from across gaming history! You will need to complete all of them in a row without dying to claim victory over this ultimate challenge. Learn the levels, the tricks, the specific setups and attempt to overcome them all!

Snooker Sneaker - The broken controls, physics based, escort level.

Reactive Reactor - The clunky UI, quick time event, reactionary level.

Coffin Climb - The ice physics, darkness, platformer level.

Drawn Out Battle - The slow, repetitive, boring, RPG fight level.

Speed Dating - The tight timed, ratchet movement, pushing level.

Catch the Wave - The resource management, tank controlled level.

Harold Hunt - The needle in a haystack, distraction filled level.

Slide Tide - The underwater, sliding puzzle, fetch quest level.

All you can do is Jump - The invisible object, lack of control level.

Don't Point Blanks - The fast paced, limited bullet, shooter level.

The Digital Palace that you will explore through your experience.

This is the central hub for accessing everything in the game. You get to choose how many spaces to move so you can plan accordingly to overcome the board. Travel to levels, collect harm cards and visit the shop! Find your way through to the exit by beating every obstacle!

Level Space - Allows you to access one of the levels you have to beat!

Harm Space - Collect harm cards that will hinder you on your journey!

Shop Space - Buy items to help you make it through the experience!

Mix-Up Space - Spaces on the board change to be become random!

The people you will encounter as you attempt to beat the game.

Meet the cast that you will encounter throughout your travels through this hellscape! Each of them bring something unique to the table to add a new dimension to the game in the forms of items, tips, collectables and advice! But for one of them...

Tipsy the Fairy

She will do her best to give you tips through your journey and move you to better spaces on the board when she thinks you're in trouble!
